oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Signing of the lease papers for Downtown Shopping Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men sit at a desk. Two men sign papers in a binder.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Business enterprises; Contracts; Downtown Shopping Center; Interiors
Glazer, Guilford; Wende, Ernest A.; Worrel, Lyle D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See The Oak Ridger article of April 2, 1954 which states, "Signing the voluminous shopping center lease on Thursday were Guilford Glazer, president of Oak Ridge properties, and Lyle D. Worrel, project manager for Management Services, Inc., center, and E. A. Wende, right, deputy manager of the Oak Ridge Operations Office of the AEC, officially endorsed the lease for the government."
Signing of Downtown properties; Guilford Glazer; Lyle D. Worrel; Ernie Wende
